about_the_game:
The 8-track OST for Self-Checkout Unlimited, featuring the talents of Sebastien Zunino and desert sand feels warm at night!

Half of the soundtrack is comprised of smooth jazz themes composed Mr. Zunino (featured in the mall hub area), while the other half are surreal, vaporwave-inspired themes by desert sand.

Tracks are available in both MP3 and WAV format. Both the "clean" (non-reverb/filtered) and "mall speaker aesthetic" versions of the jazz tracks are included.

name: Self-Checkout Unlimited Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 700 MB available space

short_description: The 8-track OST for Self-Checkout Unlimited, featuring jazzy and vaporwave-inspired tracks.
